me.ryandw11.ods.internal

Class InternalUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ryandw11.ods.internal.InternalUtils

  • public class InternalUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the internal methods that all storage types use.

    • Method Detail

      • getSubObjectData

        protected static Tag<?> getSubObjectData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data,
                                         java.lang.String key)
        Get a tag based upon the name. This method is used by the ObjectDataStructure.get(String), this is a recursive method.
        Parameters:
        data - The list of data.
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The tag

      • findSubObjectData

        protected static boolean findSubObjectData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data,
                                           java.lang.String key)
        Check to see if a key exists within a file. This method is used by the ObjectDataStructure.find(String) method.
        Parameters:
        data - The array of bytes.
        key - The key to find
        Returns:
        If the key could be found.

      • deleteSubObjectData

        protected static byte[] deleteSubObjectData(byte[] data,
                                            KeyScout counter)
        Delete a key from the file.
        Parameters:
        data - The input from the data.
        counter - The scout information.
        Returns:
        The output array of bytes.

      • replaceSubObjectData

        protected static byte[] replaceSubObjectData(byte[] data,
                                             KeyScout counter,
                                             byte[] dataToReplace)
        Replace a tag with another tag.
        Parameters:
        data - The input array of bytes
        counter - The scout object
        dataToReplace - The bytes of the replacement data.
        Returns:
        The output bytes.

      • setSubObjectData

        protected static byte[] setSubObjectData(byte[] data,
                                         KeyScout counter,
                                         byte[] dataToReplace)
        Insert in a new tag.
        Parameters:
        data - The input array of bytes
        counter - The scout object
        dataToReplace - The bytes of the replacement data.
        Returns:
        The output bytes.

      • scoutObjectData

        protected static KeyScout scoutObjectData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data,
                                          java.lang.String key,
                                          KeyScout counter)
        This object goes through the data and scouts out the information from the given key. This method is recursive, which is why the parameter offset exists.
        Parameters:
        data - The input array of bytes
        key - The key
        counter - The Scout object.
        Returns:
        The key scout.

      • getListData

        public static java.util.List<Tag<?>> getListData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data,
                                                 int limit)
        Get the list of tags based upon bytes.

        This is meant for internal use only.

        Parameters:
        data - the array of bytes
        limit - the number of bytes that should be read.
        Returns:
        The List of tags.
